posts.name: Sarah Nnamdi
posts.comment: If you're visiting this page, you're likely here because you're searching for a random sentence. Sometimes a random word just isn't enough, and that is where the random sentence generator comes into play.

posts.name: Isaac Chukwu
posts.comment: By inputting the desired number, you can make a list of as many random sentences as you want or need.

posts.name: Trisha Luther
posts.comment: Or writers, a random sentence can help them get their creative juices flowing. Since the topic of the sentence is completely unknown, it forces the writer to be creative when the sentence appears.

posts.name: Mike Edwards
posts.comment: There are a number of different ways a writer can use the random sentence for creativity. The most common way to use the sentence is to begin a story.

posts.name: Funmi Bankole
posts.comment: Another option is to include it somewhere in the story. A much more difficult challenge is to use it to end a story. In any of these cases, it forces the writer to think creatively since they have no idea what sentence will appear from the tool.

posts.name: Israel Adesanya
posts.comment: For those writers who have writers' block, this can be an excellent way to take a step to crumbling those walls. By taking the writer away from the subject matter that is causing the block, a random sentence may allow them to see the project they're working on in a different light and perspective.

posts.name: Rebecca Cosmos
posts.comment: Sometimes all it takes is to get that first sentence down to help break the block.

posts.name: Okoye Bright
posts.comment: It can also be successfully used as a daily exercise to get writers to begin writing. Being shown a random sentence and using it to complete a paragraph each day can be an excellent way to begin any writing session.
